attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: Really bad they took my goldfish and ate him for lunch while my dinosaur was just watching them 👁👄👁 and then they started chasing my dinosaur

attributes.title: Whoa buddy
attributes.review: This app is seriously bug infested. Nothing works, it freezes everywhere and rumor has it it sells all your personal information to COVID testing centers. USER BEWARE!

attributes.title: worst app ever.
attributes.review: i went on the app and all it did was repeat “i  am big chongous” over and over again. i have severe ptsd from it. i can’t understand why someone would make an app like this. i deleted the app and it still repeated the horrendous phrase. now i have to get a new phone....anyway, biden 2020

attributes.title: Idk it’s bad...
attributes.review: I’m sorry but but it Glitches I think it’s just probably my phone battery but it’s my phone batteries at like 99%....remake it!!!

attributes.title: The Worst App Ever
attributes.review: WOW I have no words for how utterly terrible this app is. It actually gave my sister cardiac arrest and killed my dog. Not to mention the fact that it’s ugly and slow.

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: this app made my pet llama go missing in the rocky mountains with the sun in my head so it was like a dream come back to my house today i is my life so much better and more like the rest my god my life and my life i love ya my heart is like oh oh my goodness you so are beautiful i love y’all love ya love y’all too love ya too love you bye but not for this app yeah❤️

attributes.title: DONT DO IT
attributes.review: This app reminds me of people giving out fruit for halloweeen. It’s irrelevant and irritating. I’d rather lick a sidewalk than even look at this app again.

attributes.title: WORST APP ON APP STORE
attributes.review: this app literally made my grandmother have a stroke and then released all the demons from the 7 circles of hell (bunker boy being all). remove this app from the app store now.

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: Words cannot describe how bad this app is. They tried to take away my rights and called me a slur. Honestly it shouldn’t be on the App Store

attributes.title: very horrible
attributes.userName: a ex trump lover and supporter
attributes.review: this app gave my phone a virus, i had to buy a whole new phone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!! if i could leave zero stars i would
